content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{\"size\":159280,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9e259471-b364-4e29-afc4-85273c325fe0/map_Krasnodar.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9e259471-b364-4e29-afc4-85273c325fe0/map_Krasnodar.jpg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"map_Krasnodar.jpg\",\"name\":\"map_Krasnodar.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9e259471-b364-4e29-afc4-85273c325fe0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055,\"height\":501.125},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Krasnodar Office is located at Yankovskogo street, 169.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have the entire 3rd floor at our disposal. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
